EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Munich_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Roadshow! Please see your event details below.
Date: Tuesday, 11 April 2017 {{my.Save the Date Munich:default=edit me}}
Time:
8.30am - 1.15pm Strategy Session 1.15pm - 5.15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
Allianz Seidlstraße 24-24a, 80335 München, Germany, Room NY(map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Seidlstra%C3%9Fe+24,+80335+M%C3%BCnchen,+Germany/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x479e75fc8355bdc9:0xbb66c80601cd1066?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjL25XQk5DSAhVB7WMKHTZUBdwQ8gEIGTAA]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/munich?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
